msbt.message: My goal for this year is to talk and hang out with you as much as I can!Seems like it's working out already.
I wonder what my first dream of this year will be like. Maybe I'll dream up a new recipe Here's to sweet dreams in the new year, !
I have a new year's tradition of doing calligraphy to start the year, but I'm having trouble picking what to write. Maybe I'll do ink brush art of your name, !
I decided to start off my new year by making some old family recipes.My dad loves to cook for me, and I guess I'm a little bit homesick for the things he makes to feed me.
Yesterday was so hectic. I was busy trying to wrap up unfinished things before the end of the year. I'm glad this is a holiday, because I think I deserve a break from my chores and errands for a day.
